project_tech_stack.text: WordPress, HTML(5), CSS(3), SASS, SMACS, JavaScript & jQuery, Greensock

project_main_text.text: Think FM Solutions is an independently owned facilities management company. Â The brief was to create a clean looking, simple website to showcase the services the company provides. It is a one page scrolling website, with some separate pages if more info is required. I built the website to be easy for the client to maintain via WordPress and to work beautifully across all devices.
